Room.Name: One-on-One Arena
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small arena with a single opponent gladiator as your foe.
Room.LongDescription: The ultimate test of a warrior's ability is their ability to stand up to a single gladiator in a one-on-one, hand-to-hand, battle to the death combat. Not just anyone can do such a feat, but there's no shame in a proud fight to the death. A quick escape back into the Preparation Room is not available as the door to the room has been sealed from the opposite side.
